data.text: @ChannelNewsAsia And the initial variants would have swept through the population, leaving very few left standing to care for the sick or even keep the lights on.

@ChannelNewsAsia What wasn't taken into consideration is the effect that permitting offshore (and potentially contagious) citizens to cross the border could have had. Look at what happened to Kiribati once they permitted their missionaries in. NZ is a tiny nation. 1/2
@GroundedKiwis @ChannelNewsAsia A cost I, and thousands of other gladly paid to protect the life's of thousands of kiwis
@ChannelNewsAsia Thank you for drawing attention to the cost paid by offshore New Zealanders.  This is a good overview of that aspect of New Zealand’s COVID response.
